text: Replace pylab by pyplot. Also, I reraise the import exception because, in the case of people that doesn't have matplotlib installed, we want to raise a meaningful error and not crash in the middle of a script.
title: Replace pylab import by pyplot

text: Replace pylab by pyplot. Also, I reraise the import exception because, in the case of people that doesn't have matplotlib installed, we want to raise a meaningful error and not crash in the middle of a script.
title: Replace pylab import by pyplot
Pull request merge from AlexandreAbraham/nilearn:fix_525 to nilearn/nilearn:master

text:
You may as well replace all `import pylab` instances while you are at it.

```
~/dev/nilearn $ git grep -l pylab nilearn
nilearn/plotting/displays.py
nilearn/plotting/img_plotting.py
nilearn/plotting/tests/test_cm.py
nilearn/plotting/tests/test_displays.py
nilearn/plotting/tests/test_img_plotting.py
```
